front.title: PCN Boundary Node Behaviour for the Single Marking (SM) Mode of Operation

abstract.t: Precongestion notification (PCN) is a means for protecting quality of service for inelastic traffic admitted to a Diffserv domain. The overall PCN architecture is described in RFC 5559. This memo is one of a series describing possible boundary node behaviours for a PCN domain. The behaviour described here is that for two-state measurement-based load control, known informally as Single Marking (SM).
